com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase

Class HBaseHealthCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
      • com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.HBaseHealthCheck

  • public class HBaseHealthCheck
extends com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
    A HealthCheck for an HBase table using an HBaseClient.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck

      HBaseHealthCheck(HBaseClient client, String name, String table)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HBaseHealthCheck

        public HBaseHealthCheck(HBaseClient client,
                String name,
                String table)
        Checks the health of the given HBaseClient by connecting and testing for the given table.
        Parameters:
        client - the client to check the health of.
        name - the name of this HealthCheck.
        table - the name of the table to look for.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        protected com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck.Result check()
                                                    throws Exception
        Checks the health of the configured HBaseClient by using it to test for the configured table.
        Specified by:
        check in class com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
        Returns:
        Result#healthy() if the client can be used to confirm the table exists; or Result#unhealthy(String) either if the table does not exist or the client times out while checking for the table.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an unexpected Exception occurs while checking the health of the client.
